reporting.reportvalue.ValueQuery:
/* Returns the number of orders from @FromDate to @ToDate */ SET @FromDate = {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'month'); SET @ToDate = {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@ToDate,'month'); SET @ToDate = DATEADD(MONTH, 1, @ToDate); -- Include month in which @ToDate is included
SELECT CAST(ISNULL(COUNT(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency),0) AS DECIMAL(38,0)) FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (@FromDate IS NULL OR @FromDate <= OrderDate) AND (@ToDate IS NULL OR @ToDate > OrderDate)
